dcterms:creator: G. J. Brostow

dcterms:description: A high-definition ground truth database for semantic object classes in video, containing 11 classes such as sky, building, pole, road, sidewalk, tree, sign, fence, car, pedestrian, and bicyclist.
dcterms:title: CamVid

dcterms:description: A dataset for semantic urban scene understanding, providing high-resolution images with pixel-level annotations for various classes.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes
